trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There were no other sightings in Escondido on or around March 21st 2006
Summary: It had no lights, no sound, and the color was translusent or gray
divs: sighting detailsme, my son and wife were sitting in the hot tub when my son said, "do you see that?" my wife and myself look up and see a triangular, translucent \ gray, two-dimensional looking shape, almost like it was all wings gliding thought the sky. it moved in a strait path north\west in a direction abnormal to the flight path of other aircraft. it made no sound and had no lights. at first we thought it might be a bird gliding thought the sky, but it was moving way to fast and the wings never flapped. then we thought it could be a hang glider, but it was moving way to fast. we finally lost sight of it as it blended into the night sky. deciding that we could not figure out what it was, we have determined it to be a ufo.
